title: Gary Coleman
summary: Gary Wayne Coleman (February 8, 1968 â€“ May 28, 2010) was an American actor and comedian. One of the highest-paid child actors in the late 1970s and early 1980s, he was rated first on a list of VH1's "100 Greatest Kid Stars".[1] He received several accolades throughout his career, including two Young Artist Awards and four People's Choice Awards.
